description: Structured information on data originating from human/animal studies or simulations (version level).

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces.description: Level to which something is accessible to someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces.title: accessibility

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho._instruction: Add all parties that contributed to this dataset version as authors. Note that these authors will overwrite the author list provided for the overarching dataset.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.description: Creator of a literary or creative work, as well as a dataset publication.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.title: author

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav._instruction: Add all behavioral protocols that were performed in this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.title: behavioralProtocol

holder._instruction: Add all parties that hold this copyright.
holder.description: Legal person in possession of something.
holder.title: holder

year._instruction: Enter the year during which the copyright was first asserted and, optionally, later years during which updated versions were published.
year.description: Cycle in the Gregorian calendar specified by a number and comprised of 365 or 366 days divided into 12 months beginning with January and ending with December.
year.title: year

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo._instruction: Add all parties that fulfill the role of a custodian for the research product version (e.g., a research group leader or principle investigator). Custodians are typically the main contact in case of misconduct, obtain permission from the contributors to publish personal information, and maintain the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of the research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.title: custodian

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT._instruction: Add all semantic data types (raw, derived and/or simulated) provided in this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT.title: dataType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description (or abstract) of this research product version. Note that this version specific description will overwrite the description for the overarching dataset.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.title: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.title: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ethic._instruction: Add the result of the ethics assessment of this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ethic.description: Judgment about the applied principles of conduct governing an individual or a group.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ethic.title: ethicsAssessment

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/exper._instruction: Add all experimental approaches which this dataset version has deployed.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/exper.title: experimentalApproach

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD._instruction: Add the publication or file that acts as the full documentation of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD.description: Non-abridged instructions, comments, and information for using a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD.title: fullDocumentation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (or title) for this research product version. Note that this version specific full name will overwrite the full name for the overarching dataset.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.title: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi._instruction: Add all funding information of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.description: Money provided by a legal person for a particular purpose.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.title: funding

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.title: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this research product version. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.description: Preferred format for citing a particular object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.title: howToCite

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input._instruction: Add the data that was used as input for this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.description: Data that is put into a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.title: inputData

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt._instruction: Add all dataset versions that can be used alternatively to this dataset version.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.title: isAlternativeVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew._instruction: Add the dataset version preceding this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.title: isNewVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo._instruction: Add all relevant keywords to this research product version either by adding controlled terms or by suggesting new terms.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.description: Significant word or concept that are representative of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.title: keyword

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen._instruction: Add the license of this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.description: Grant by a party to another party as an element of an agreement between those parties that permits to do, use, or own something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.title: license

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other.description: Structured information on the contribution made to a research product.

contributor._instruction: Add all types of contribution made by the stated 'contributor'.
contributor.description: Legal person that gave or supplied something as a part or share.
contributor.title: contributor

type._instruction: Add the party that performed the contribution.
type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
type.title: type

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa._instruction: Add all preparation types used in this dataset version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa.title: preparationDesign

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto._instruction: Add all protocols that were performed in this dataset version (e.g., for data acquisition or processing).

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto.title: protocol

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add all further publications besides the full documentation that provide the original context for the production of this research product version (e.g., an original research article that used or produced the data of this research product version).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.description: Reference to something that was made available for the general public to see or buy.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.title: relatedPublication

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) on which this research product version was first release, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.title: releaseDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos._instruction: Add the file repository of this research product version.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.title: repository

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a short name (or alias) for this research product version that could be used as a shortened display title (e.g., for web services with too little space to display the full name).

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.title: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi._instruction: Add all specimens or sets of specimen that were studied in this dataset.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/studi.title: studiedSpecimen

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/suppo.title: supportChannel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.title: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description (or summary) of the novelties/peculiarities of this research product version in comparison to its preceding versions. If this research product version is the first version, you can enter the following disclaimer 'This is the first version of this research product'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.title: versionInnovation
